bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with mu ji 目疾 , ailments of the eyes. Zhu bing yuan hou lun 諸病源候論 28: 凡目病，若 肝氣不足，兼胸膈風痰勞熱，則目不能遠視 , “For all eye diseases [the following applies]. If the liver qi is insufficient, and if at the same time the chest and diaphragm have wind and phlegm, associated with exhaustion heat, the eyes cannot see into the distance”.
